文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_026_chunk5
证据片段: The corrosion resistance of a series of Zircaloy-4 laser, electron-beam (EB), and tungsten inert gas (TIG) welds was evaluated in high-temperature water and steam

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_026_chunk5
证据片段: Corrosion exposures carried out in 633 K water revealed that all welds had excellent corrosion resistance at this temperature

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_026_chunk5
证据片段: corrosion exposures carried out in 673 K steam indicated that the laser and EB welds were susceptible to accelerated corrosion, whereas the TIG welds were not

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_026_chunk5
证据片段: TIG welds were not susceptible to accelerated corrosion

文献ID: STP754-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_5th Volume_026_chunk5
证据片段: EMA revealed that the welds which underwent accelerated corrosion always exhibited tin, iron, and chromium depletion in the fusion zone
